mapper.select: SELECT SYS_NO AS "sysNo", SYS_NM AS "sysNm" FROM SYSTEM WHERE SYS_NM != '한국소프트SRM'
SELECT SR_TYPE_NO AS "srTypeNo", SR_TYPE_NM AS "srTypeNm" FROM SR_TYPE
SELECT STTS_NO AS "sttsNo", STTS_NM AS "sttsNm" FROM SR_STTS WHERE STTS_NO = 5 OR STTS_NO = 6 OR STTS_NO = 8 OR STTS_NO = 10

SELECT SR_NO AS "srNo", SR_TYPE_NM AS "srTypeNm", SR_TTL AS "srTtl", SR_STD AS "srStd", SYS_NM AS "sysNm", STTS_NM AS "sttsNm", USER_DP_NM AS "userDpNm", USER_NM AS "requesterNm", SR_REG_DATE AS "srRegDate", SR_DDLN_DATE AS "srDdlnDate", SR_CN AS "srCn", SR_PRY AS "srPry", SR_BGT AS "srBgt", SR_DEV_CN AS "srDevCn", SR.SYS_NO AS "sysNo" FROM SR sr, SR_TYPE type ,SYSTEM system, SR_STTS stts, USERS users WHERE sr.sr_type = type.sr_type_no AND sr.sys_no = system.sys_no AND sr.stts_no = stts.stts_no AND sr.sr_cust_no = users.user_no AND sr_no = #{srNo}

SELECT USER_DP_NM AS "dpNm", USER_NM AS "developerNm", SR_START_DATE AS "srStartDate", SR_END_DATE AS "srEndDate" FROM SR sr, HR hr, USERS users WHERE sr.sr_no = hr.sr_no AND hr.user_no = users.user_no AND hr_leader = 'Y' AND sr.SR_NO = #{srNo}
SELECT SR_FILE_NO AS "srFileNo", SR_FILE_PHYS_NM AS "srFilePhysNm", SR_FILE_EXTN_NM AS "srFileExtnNm", SR_FILE_ACTL_NM AS "srFileActlNm" FROM SR_FILE WHERE SR_NO = #{srNo}
SELECT SR_FILE_PHYS_NM AS "srFilePhysNm", SR_FILE_EXTN_NM AS "srFileExtnNm", SR_FILE_ACTL_NM AS "srFileActlNm" FROM SR_FILE WHERE SR_FILE_NO = #{srFileNo}

SELECT hr.USER_NO AS "userNo", USER_NM AS "userNm", USER_DP_NM AS "userDpNm", USER_JBPS AS "userJbps", USER_TELNO AS "userTelno", TASK_NM AS "taskNm", HR_START_DATE AS "hrStartDate", HR_END_DATE AS "hrEndDate", HR_LEADER AS "hrLeader" FROM HR hr, USERS users, TASK task WHERE hr.user_no = users.user_no AND hr.task_no = task.task_no AND sr_no = #{srNo} ORDER BY hr_leader DESC

SELECT USERS.USER_NO AS "userNo", USER_NM AS "userNM", USER_JBPS AS "userJbps", USER_TELNO AS "userTelno" FROM USERS users LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SR_NO, USER_NO FROM HR hr WHERE SR_NO = #{srNo}) hr ON users.user_no = hr.user_no WHERE hr.user_no IS NULL AND USER_DP_NM = #{userDpNm}
SELECT SR_TTL AS "srTtl", HR_START_DATE AS "hrStartDate", HR_END_DATE AS "hrEndDate" FROM SR sr, HR hr WHERE sr.sr_no = hr.sr_No AND user_no = #{userNo}
SELECT TASK_NO AS "taskNo", TASK_NM AS "taskNm" FROM TASK

SELECT PROG_FILE_NO AS "progFileNo", PROG_NO AS "progNo", PROG_FILE_PHYS_NM AS "progFilePhysNm", PROG_FILE_ACTL_NM AS "progFileActlNm", PROG_FILE_EXTN_NM AS "progFileExtnNm" FROM PROG_FILE WHERE PROG_FILE_NO = #{progFileNo}
